short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays notifications when song changes on Spotify.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HOW TO USE:
1. Download extension
2. Navigate to https://open.spotify.com
3. Play any song and you'll receive a notification with the Title and Artist of the song any time the song changes

Enjoy!
